title: SmartFlow Reinforcement Learning and Agentic AI for Bike-Sharing Optimisation
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: SmartFlow is a multi-layered framework that integrates Reinforcement Learning and Agentic AI to address the dynamic rebalancing problem in urban bike-sharing services.
